home.hero: We are students who carry the voice of others, promote education and bring unforgettable experiences to student life.
home.eventsdesc: Our events include everything from educational study nights to a spectacular student bar.
home.coopdesc: We have a long track record of working with a wide range of companies, organisations and universities.

aboutus.answer: ITÜK or TalTech Student Council of the School of Information Technologies is...
aboutus.answer2: ...a student organization, whose goal is to represent the interests of the IT-faculty students, and further their education, well-being and offer them entertainment. ITÜK is an abbreviation in Estonian that stands for 'IT-teaduskonna üliõpilaskogu'.
aboutus.answer3: We have members from all the IT-faculty study programmes, who are active, helpful and give a voice to the other students and who can help with studies or everyday problems.

card1.title: Organising events
card1.description: Leave your mark by organising events and creating unforgettable memories for yourself and fellow students!

card2.title: Friends for life
card2.description: From ITÜK, you can find friends and like-minded students, with whom you can take on future challenges and do great deeds with!

statuses.status3: Alumni (Leaving the organisation or graduating after being a full member for a year);
statuses.status4: Board member (A member who represents the organisation).

aboutus.structure2: Every spring the full members elect board members and a chairman who make up the organisation board for a year. Board members are responsible for their respective areas.
aboutus.structure3: All members of ITÜK can run for the board, no matter their member status. But to become a full member one must actively help with organising and creating events or other projects.

card1.description: Leave your mark by organising events and creating unforgettable memories for yourself and fellow students!

join.text2: So if You're ready for a thrilling journey, don't wait and join us today!

event.noyears: There are no events to display. Events probably lacked public advertisements (i.e. internal events) or there were no events organised.

partners.offer: What can ITÜK offer their partners?
partners.wish: Want to support the development of the future of IT?
partners.goal: Our goal is to further the education, well-being and sense of community of studens by organising unforgettable events and offering valuable experiences. With your support we can create even bigger and more memorable events!
partners.contact2: and together we can make great ideas a reality!

style.title: TalTech IT Faculty Student Council Style Guide

name_abbreviation.heading: Name and abbreviation
name_abbreviation.context: If the name of the ITÜK is used in a context where a considerable part of the readers do not know what ITÜK stands for, please write the name out (e.g., TalTech IT Faculty Student Council).
name_abbreviation.valid_names_text: The name can be spelled as follows:
name_abbreviation.valid_names_1: Tallinn University of Technology IT Faculty Student Council
name_abbreviation.alternative_names_1: Tallinn University of Technology School of IT Faculty Student Council
name_abbreviation.alternative_names_2: TalTech School of IT Faculty Student Council
name_abbreviation.important: Important! Pay attention to the use of uppercase and lowercase letters. It is not allowed to misspell the name of ITÜK!
name_abbreviation.abbreviation_case: The abbreviation ITÜK is not hyphenated.

logo.heading: Logo
logo.description: Here you can download all versions of the logo. Please avoid using raster graphics. For web use SVG files and for print use PDF files. Please avoid using SVG for print and PDF for web, as they are in RGB and CMYK color models respectively, which are not directly convertible.
logo.internal_use_heading: Use of the logo with or without the TalTech logo
logo.internal_use_context: Within TalTech, the ITÜK logo is used without the TalTech logo to avoid repetition of the same logo in events, posters, advertisements, etc. Outside TalTech, a logo version is used with the TalTech logo.
logo.logo_variants_use_2: When the long logo is not readable.
logo.logo_variants_use_3: In case it is easy to associate ITÜK with the icon.
logo.icon_usage: The icon can be used with or without a box.

logo_colors.heading: Logo colors
logo_colors.instructions: When choosing the colours for the logo, please note:
logo_colors.color_usage_1: Colored logo - use on a white or very light background (the darkest background allowed is #ebebeb).
logo_colors.color_usage_2: Black logo - use on a white or light background (the darkest background allowed is #a1a1a1).
logo_colors.color_usage_3: White logo - use on a coloured or dark background
logo_colors.contrast_check: The text on the logo MUST comply with the WCAG AAA standard. Check it

protected_area.heading: Protected Area
protected_area.description: The logo must have a protected area on all sides, the width of which is equal to the '_' width of the '>' character in the logo. For example:
protected_area.instructions: No other elements may be placed in the protected area.

typography.heading: Typography
typography.description: ITÜK uses Raleway font for logos. The font used in the body text is Noto Sans Georgian.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.description: Any questions about the brand identity of the ITÜK can be sent to the following email address:
contact.note: Please do not be creative with the identity, but coordinate all questions with ITÜK.
